author: Tendai Moyo
testimonial: We needed a thorough background check for a new executive hire. Shadow Watch delivered a detailed report quickly, and their team explained everything clearly. The process was discreet and professional.

author: Farai Chikore
testimonial: I was worried about my partner’s behavior and reached out for an infidelity investigation. The investigators were sensitive and kept everything confidential. The findings were presented honestly, which helped me make an informed decision.

author: Rutendo Nyathi
testimonial: We needed DNA verification for a sensitive case. Shadow Watch coordinated with certified labs and kept us updated throughout. The results were accurate and delivered on time.

author: Tatenda Mudzonga

author: Chipo Dube
testimonial: I requested a polygraph test for a workplace dispute. The examiner was professional and explained the process clearly. The results helped resolve the issue fairly.

author: Simba Mapfumo
testimonial: Shadow Watch provided business intelligence reports for our merger. Their due diligence uncovered risks we hadn’t considered, saving us from potential losses. Highly recommended for corporate investigations.
